title: This Month's GTA+ Benefits
headline: This Month's GTA+ Benefits
content:
In addition to the recurring monthly GTA$500,000 deposit directly into your Maze Bank account, GTA+ members who've signed up for this month (September 14 - October 11) will also receive:

- The new Bravado Hotring Hellfire
- The Kosatka Guided Missile upgrade
- Exclusive clothing
- 2X Rewards on the Assault on Cayo Perico adversary mode
- And more

Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel any time. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
